name: 【﻿ｖａｐｏｒｂｒｅａｋｅｒ】
description:
V a p o r w a v e ' s Arkanoid (Breakout) with random power-ups, random score per block, soundtrack and more. 

Game controls:

Keyboard:

A / D / left / right = Move paddle.

Mouse = Move pointer.

Left mouse click / Left Ctrl = Release ball at pointer direction. / Shoot projectiles if "shooter" power-up was collected.

Right Shift / Left Shift = Use paddle's impulse

Tab = Change to next (random) song

Xbox Controller:

Left Analog / D-pad = Move paddle.

Right Analog = Move pointer.

X = Release ball at pointer direction. / Shoot projectiles if "shooter" power-up was collected.

Triggers = Use paddle's impulse

Back = Change to next (random) song
